verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> Lam-natz-tze-acho the chief Musician עַל־ <WH5921> [T'al-and שׁוּשַׁ֣ן shu-Shan עֵד֑וּת <WH7802> 'e-Dut; upon Shushaneduth מִכְתָּ֖ם <WH4387> mich-Tam Michtam לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid of David לְלַמֵּֽד׃ <WH3925> le-lam-Med. to teach בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ׀ <WH5327> be-hatz-tzo-To when he strove אֶ֥ת <WH854> 'et for אֲרַ֣ם 'a-Ram נַהֲרַיִם֮ <WH763> na-ha-ra-Yim Aham-naharaim וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et for אֲרַ֪ם 'a-Ram צ֫וֹבָ֥ה <WH760> tzo-Vah and with Aramzobah וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov returned יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> yo-'Av, when Joab וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach and smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> e-Dom of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <WH1516> be-gei- in the valley מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> Me-lach; of salt שְׁנֵ֖ים <WH8147> she-Neim both עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> 'A-lef. thousand אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ <WH2186> ze-nach-Ta-nu thou hast cast us off פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ <WH6555> fe-ratz-Ta-nu; thou hast scattered אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ <WH599> 'a-Naf-ta, us thou hast been displeased תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵ֥ב <WH7725> te-Sho-Vev O turn thyself to us again לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה <WH7493> hir-'Ash-tah to tremble אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz Thou hast made the earth פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ <WH6480> pe-tzam-Tah; thou hast broken רְפָ֖ה <WH7495> re-Fah it heal שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ <WH7667> she-va-Rei-ha the breaches כִי־ <WH3588> chi- for מָֽטָה׃ <WH4131> Ma-tah. thereof for it shaketh

הִרְאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> hir-'I-tah Thou hast shewed עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha thy people קָשָׁ֑ה <WH7186> ka-Shah; hard things הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ <WH8248> hish-ki-Ta-nu, thou hast made us to drink יַ֣יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin the wine תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃ <WH8653> tar-'e-Lah. of astonishment

נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <WH5414> na-Tat-tah Thou hast given לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ <WH3373> li-re-'Ei-cha to them that fear נֵּ֭ס <WH5251> nes a banner לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס <WH5127> le-hit-no-Ses; thee that it may be displayed מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei, because קֹ֣שֶׁט <WH7189> Ko-shet of the truth סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> Le-ma-'an because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <WH2502> ye-chal-Tzun may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <WH3039> ye-di-Dei-cha; That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <WH3467> ho-Shi-'ah save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> ye-mi-ne-Cha [with] thy right hand; וַעֲנֵנוּ va-'a-ne-nu כוַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6032> va-'a-Ne-ni. answer ק

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> be-ka-de-Sho, in his holiness אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה <WH5937> 'e'-Lo-zah I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <WH2505> 'a-chal-le-Kah I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> she-Chem; Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> ve-'E-mek the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <WH4058> 'a-mad-Ded. and mete out

לִ֤י li גִלְעָ֨ד׀ <WH1568> gil-'Ad Gilead וְלִ֬י ve-Li מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, [is] mine and Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <WH669> Ve-'ef-ra-yim [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> ma-'oz also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> ro-Shi; of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, Judah מְחֹֽקְקִי׃ <WH2710> me-Cho-ke-ki. [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב׀ <WH4124> mo-'Av Moab סִ֬יר <WH5518> sir caldron רַחְצִ֗י <WH7366> rach-Tzi, is My washbowl עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Over אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> 'E-dom over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> 'ash-Lich will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <WH5275> na-'a-Li; my shoe עָ֝לַ֗י <WH5921> 'a-Lai, because פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> pe-Le-shet Philistia הִתְרֹעָֽעִֽי׃ <WH7321> hit-ro-'A-'I. triumph

מִ֣י <WH4310> mi Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <WH2986> Yoi-le-ni Who will bring עִ֣יר <WH5892> 'ir Ai מָצ֑וֹר <WH4692> ma-Tzor; me [into] the strong מִ֖י <WH4310> mi Who נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> na-Cha-ni will lead עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> e-Dom. Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ha-lo- not אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah Yourself אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [Wilt] not thou O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH2186> ze-nach-Ta-nu; [which] hadst cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> te-Tze [which] didst not go out אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, ;and [thou] O God בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> be-tziv-'o-Tei-nu. our armies

הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu עֶזְרָ֣ת <WH5833> 'ez-Rat us help מִצָּ֑ר <WH6862> mitz-Tzar; from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <WH7723> ve-Shav, for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <WH8668> te-shu-'At [is] the help אָדָם׃ <WH120> 'a-dam of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> be-lo-Him Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> na-'a-seh- we shall do חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu, who יָב֥וּס <WH947> ya-Vus for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> tza-Rei-nu. our enemies
